SummaryEnglish: Bad Boys vs Crazy Girls tells the story of the most popular boy and girl who hate each other have the surprise of their lives when they find out that they are engaged. For Kate (played by Megan Domani), Liam (played by Devano Danendra) is her mortal enemy.

1.SummaryEnglish: Since the first time they met, Liam and Kate have been enemies. Unexpectedly, they are transferred to the same boarding school: MERAH PUTIH HIGHSCHOOL. The feud begins.

2.SummaryEnglish: Liam and Kate hate their dorms, especially since their cell phones are being confiscated while in the dorms. For the sake of their longing for their respective partners, they will try to steal back what has been taken away from them.

3.SummaryEnglish: After Liam and Kate managed to get their cell phones, they immediately contacted their respective partners. Kate and Michael prepare a crazy plan to escape the dormitory. Unbeknownst to Kate, Liam kept an eye on her.

4.SummaryEnglish: Liam and Kate begin to realize that they have a common goal. They decided to work together to get out of school. A big mess is now in the works.

5.SummaryEnglish: Kate and Liam's party ends in chaos. They were sentenced to remain in the dormitory during the renovations while other students were sent home. But it wouldn't be Kate and Liam if they didn't have another trick up their sleeve.

6.SummaryEnglish: Liam and Kate decided to go to a private island belonging to Kate's best friend. Unexpectedly, a bad surprise awaited them.

7.SummaryEnglish: Kate and Liam learn the unexpected while on the island. But the islanders will also experience the surprising things that Kate and Liam will do.

8.SummaryEnglish: When Kate and Liam return to the dormitory, they become aware of issues that need to be fixed at the school. They determine to take an initiative. An initiative that could again bring chaos to the school.

9.SummaryEnglish: A double cross Fiona planned makes Kate angry and disappointed with Liam. Kate promised Liam that after prom they would never see each other again.

10.SummaryEnglish: After school, Liam and Kate must follow their parents' plans. If they don't do something, Kate and Liam realize that their relationship will end in hostility instead of love.
